title: Xing Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Xing.com with detailed information. Search by keyword, location, and discipline, or provide a direct Xing jobs search URL. The scraper retrieves job titles, company names, locations, salaries, employment types, and full descriptions.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Xing jobs search URL (e.g., https://www.xing.com/jobs/t-remote?keywords=Remote). If provided, this will override Keyword/Location/Discipline filters.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword or title, e.g., 'Remote', 'Software Developer', 'Project Manager', 'Data Analyst'.

location.title: Location
location.description: City or region to filter jobs by location, e.g., 'Berlin', 'Munich', 'Hamburg'. Leave empty for all locations.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: Enable this to visit each job detail page and extract complete job descriptions, salary information, and employment type details.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of job listings to collect. Set to a specific number to limit results or leave at default for comprehensive scraping.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to visit. Prevents excessive scraping on large result sets.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies are recommended for reliable access to Xing.com.

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Automatically remove duplicate job URLs from results using in-memory deduplication.
